snippet.title: The Simulation - Teaser Summer Game Fest 2024
snippet.description:
Our collaboration with Blumhouse Games for our upcoming horror title, The Simulation, has just been announced at the Summer Game Fest.

A never-before-seen horror game is the only evidence found at a crime scene. As a retired game designer hired to investigate the case, you find a hidden mode that plunges you into the unknown. As more obscure games are uncovered, cross the fourth wall of their worlds and investigate terrifying truths that transcend their own reality...

More coming soon. Visit www,playmestudio.com and subscribe.

#summergamefest2024 #horrorgaming #horrorstories #videogames
